name: Raytrace
body:
### Raytracer
Although there are some minor details I have yet to address, the vast majority of the features have been implemented. These include a variety of materials and shapes, support for texture mapping, soft shadows, global illumination, GPU acceleration and adaptive multisampling.

![Maximum samples per second of various processors](http://i62.tinypic.com/2wdx1s0.png)
**Please note the result for the LG G2 is not comparable and is provided here as a guide only.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
